alert.note: Alert for Clark; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 7:28PM EDT until July 24 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in west central Ohio... Central Madison County in central Ohio... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Charleston, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... London, South Charleston, Lisbon, Brighton, South Vienna, Newport and Plattsburg. This includes I-70 in Ohio near mile marker 67. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
